snippet: Audio recordings reveal that the local authorities acknowledged the purpose of a 37-square-mile no-fly zone was to keep away news helicopters during violent street protests in Ferguson, Mo.
abstract: Audio recordings reveal that request by Ferguson, Mo, police in August that federal government impose flight restrictions over city was intended to keep away news helicopters during violent street protests.
lead_paragraph: Audio recordings reveal that the local authorities acknowledged the purpose of a 37-square-mile no-fly zone was to keep away news helicopters during violent street protests in Ferguson, Mo.

headline.main: Police Targeted Media With No-Fly Zone Over Ferguson, Tapes Show
headline.print_headline: Police Targeted Media With No-Fly Zone Over Ferguson, Tapes Show
